column1: starts off wide outside offstump and swinging further away, called a wide
back of a length outside off, he opens the face of the bat to guide it to third man
stays over the wicket to the left-hander, on the leg stumps and tucked away. Straight to square leg
keeps it straight, on a length and angling slightly across, he defends in front of off stump
fuller and a hint of movement across the batsman, who squirts it off the outside edge towards gully
hit on the pads too early into the shot. On leg stump and he tried to turn it away, but was struck on the pads

that's a well-run two. On leg stump again and this time he can tuck it away towards fine leg, where there is no fielder. They call quickly for the second and Nazmul puts in the dive when getting back to be safely home.
overpitched and drifting down the pads, he's able to flick it away to deep square leg
on a length outside off, punched towards point
takes a half step forward and punches this down the ground, past the bowler to long-off
that's almost an inswinger! wobbles in the air and comes in, he defends it from the stumps
picked the length early that time, got down on one knee to sweep hard but straight to square leg, who had to take a few steps to his lef tto field the ball
full toss punched back straight past the bowler, and the fielder at long-off has to run around and put in the dive to prevent the boundary
keeps it straight and fullish, clipped to mid-on
length outside off and comes back in a touch. He lets it go through to the keeper
gives him the charge, steps out and flicks it over the circle to square leg
length ball outside off, he comes forward and pushes it to mid-off and they go through for a quick single
length ball on the pads, he turns it away to square leg
goes fuller that time and on the stumps, dug out back to the bowler's right and he fields the ball
length ball on off and turning in a bit, punched back past the bowler. Mid-on dives but sloppily and they can take the single
full and on the stumps, he defends off the front foot
quicker one fired in at the stumps, he defends on the legside
a bit more flight, and he comes forward to turn it to midwicket
quicker on the stumps and defended off the back foot
some more air on that and fuller outside off, he drives it but straight to mid-off
length outside off, he comes on the front foot to steer it down to third man
gives him the charge, but can't connect well enough. rolls to mid-on off the inside edge
another quick single, clipped to mid-on and they run through.
nicely driven but straight to cover. Full on off stump and he timed it well
slower ball, ends up being a full toss, he'll feel he missed out there. managed to just twirl it towards deep square leg

got 'im! Stepped away and gave himself room to have an almighty flay at it. He intended to send it over cover, but only got an outside edge that went high in the air and settled safely into point's hands
sharp turn starts off outside off and drifts in, pitches and comes back in further. pushed to square leg
overpitched and he comes forward to pat it to long-on
plumb It's that incoming delivery again. Mujeeb has Bangladesh in some bother now. Came back in and defeated his forward prod to strike him on the pad. Palpably in front, no need of a review
again getting it to move into the batsman sharply. Mushfiqur defends it solidly
draws him forward but the ball dips a bit, he's still able to defend it with a full face
drifts down the pads and he clips it but straight to square leg
half prod to a length ball on off stump, rolls off the inside edge to fine leg
given width outside off and he square drives the full ball. Third man has to run hard to his right and put in the slide to field the ball
back of a length outside off and he dabs it down to third man
gets it to come in towards the stumps from a length, and is clipped to midwicket
angling into the batsman again, who punches it back past the bowler for a single
in the slot to drive and Mushfiqur goes for it, but can only find cover inside the circle
getting some drift into the batsman, who comes forward and defends towards mid-on
turns it into him from outside off, and defended solidly from the stumps
in the corridor, Mushfiqur opens the face of the bat to steer it to third man
drifts on the pads, but he can't get it away
read the length early and came forward to sweep, but didn't connect well. Trickles to fine leg

gets hold of it better this time, comes on the front foot to an overpitched ball and clips it past the bowler to mid-on. Mujeeb could have fielded that perhaps, but he's been a half-step slower on his fielding today. No such problems with his bowling though
short and outside off, allows Mushfiqur to slash it hard. Shahidi at cover misfields, which allows a single
short and outside off again, steered to backward point where the fielder dives to his left to stop the ball
on a length outside off, dabbed down to third man
slower ball, full and outside off. He caresses the drive but can't get past mid-on
length outside off and coming in slightly, defended to point where they go through for a quick single
first boundary of the innings came forward and drove this nicely, opening the face of the bat to pierce the gap between cover and mid-off and the timing was very good. races to the fence.
full on the stumps, still swinging in and defended

beaten floats this outside off and draws him forward, but it's perhaps the carrom ball and spins away from him just enough to beat the bat. Shahzad whips off the bails and they go upstairs, but he had dragged his foot back in time
goes straighter and flatter that time, allowing him to go back in his crease and nudge it towards square leg
gets it to turn from outside off again, and the batsman's prod is beaten
fuller and flicked through midwicket
fuller outside off, he comes forward and defends solidly
back of a length on the stumps, opens the face of the bat to guide it to third man
top edge goes to the boundary dug it in short, well directed and rising to the batsman's head. He goes for the hook and gets a thickish top edge but it's safe because there's no one fine
on the pads and turned to square leg
defended towards point, Liton wanted a single but Mushifqur sent him back with an early call
well timed, but point puts in a tumble to his right to stop the drive
defended to point again. full ball on the stumps
comes down the track, but is beaten and struck on the pads. The bowler belts out an appeal, but he was too far down
turned off the stumps towards midwicket
quicker one on the off stump and he gets his bat down in time to defended it
gives this more air but on the pads, and he's able to tuck it towards deep midwicket

dropped at slip went back to cut it, but only got a thick edge. Shahzad was right up to the stumps and it deflected off his gloves. It was at comfortable catching height to first slip's left but he couldn't hold on
length ball on off, and he comes forward to defend
over the top comes down the track and gets under the ball nicely to lift it straight back. Hits the advertising hoarding at long-off on the flush. It's given as four
slower ball on the stumps, and defended towards cover
bumper digs this in and puts some back into it. Sails over the batsman's head though and is a wide
slower ball on off, he waits for it and glides it to third man
leading edge but safe turned the bat too early and the ball flew off the edge but there was no gully and it rolls to third man
slower short ball, rises to chest high and he can get on his toes and pat it down towards midwicket
floated up on the stumps, he waits for it and drives it gently past the bowler
tossed up again, but on the pads, turned away to square leg
flatter into the pads, tucked to midwicket
angles across the batsman, but gives him enough room to slash it away towards the point fence where third man runs around to his right to clean up
back of a length on off, bounces a bit and defended
full ball, gets down on one knee to sweep it to deep square leg
short of a length outside off, he stays on the backfoot to cut it. Good timing but straight to point
slower ball on off, patted down and he wanted the quick single but Liton refused
beaten slower ball, on a length outside off. He tried to run it down to third man but missed it
length outside off, steered to point
slower ball again on off stump, he guides it to point
change of pace again, but straighter and he can tuck it towards deep midwicket
floated up on the stumps, turned towards mid-on
comes down the track, but he spots him and shortens his length. Batsman can only tuck it to mid-on
full on the stumps, he swipes it towards deep midwicket
paddled fine spots the line and length early and goes down to paddle it very fine. Not enough contact though and the ball stops short of the fence
gives himself room but the bowler fires it into his legs. Clipped to midwicket
goes over the keeper's head paddled-scooped from the stumps over the keeper. Mushfiqur becoming innovative
starts with a bouncer well targeted, and the batsman has to duck/sway out of the way
slower yorker on offstumps, he steers it with a flat bat to third man
good length on off, coming back in slightly. pushed back to the bowler
gets hold of that comes down the track. the ball was short but the batsman had enough momentum to pull it to the midwicket fence
first six of the match another short ball, pretty well directed too. But Mushfiqur stays in his crease, transfers weight back and swivels to hook it. Top edges it, but it went over fine leg
punched towards point
length on middle stump, gets forward and flicks to long-on
short of a length outside off, backs away and chops to short third man
beaten. Short ball slides across Mushfiqur as he looks to cut
pulled this time. Still angled across him but he's behind the line outside off as he drags this to deep midwicket
short of a length on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
length on leg stump, allows it to come on and drops it into the midwicket region
full at middle stump, leans in and toe-ends to midwicket with the flick
short and just outside off, mistimed cut to point's right....Nabi misfields there

beautiful. These are the shots that rekindle faith in Liton Das who has had a rather mercurial start to international cricket. Full ball outside off, nice stride to get to it and full balance as he goes inside-out over extra cover

oh geez. The very next ball, a shot that typifies his career. Another full ball at off stump, ripping away late after drifting. He's looked to sweep. Not a safe option against Rashid and you'd think he knew that going by the last ball. Top edge hangs up and slip takes it with a couple of steps to his right. A poor, poor shot to end an impressive innings
short of a length on middle stump, gets deep in the crease and taps it to midwicket off the back foot

direct hit from Shenwari and Shakib is gone! Oh this is disastrous for Bangladesh. Poor judgement from Shakib. Got back to a googly, flicked it to Shenwari's left at midwicket and just took off without a call. Mushfiqur saw no run there and he stood his ground. Shakib slipped as he looked to turn when he realised this and was nowhere in the picture as this throw came in one the bounce to take out the stumps. Mushfiqur had taken a couple of steps down, but it doesn't appear that either of them had made a call
length on leg stump, clipped to midwicket's right off the front foot
tossed up at off stump, defended on the front foot
floated up at a length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on leg stump, defended to square leg off the inside edge
length on leg stump, nudged to short fine with the angle
short of a length and in at off stump, defended off the back foot
tossed up outside off, big stride to flick into the leg side
length outside off, driven on the rise through sweeper cover

through the fielder lunging to his left at short fine leg. It's Shenwari, a hero not so long ago. This length ball slides into his pad and he tickles it fine. Shenwari can't get down quickly enough to his left
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket off the front foot

looks like Mushfiqur could be run out at the non-striker's end! It hinges on whether Rashid knocked the stumps out with his hips...looks like the tricep and elbow area on slow-mo replay. He has the ball in his hand so this will go his way! Mushfiqur Rahim is gone. Rashid picked up the throw from the leg side in front of the stumps and was falling backwards as he collected the throw and looked to take out the stumps. As a result there was some element of him falling onto the stumps but in the end it is all clean. The hip was nowhere close to the stumps. But once again, atrocious running. Kayes had blocked this googly into the square leg region. He didn't want the run. Mushfiq was past halfway because he wanted it. Had no chance of making it back. Once again, no calling.
googly outside off, blocked on the front foot
length on off stump, gets forward and uses the angle to slice this behind square on the off side
short of a length on middle stump, tapped to square leg off the back foot
full on middle stump, tapped to mid-on ad a confident call this time for the single
length ball outside off, steps out and bat-pads it after being beaten in flight
short of a length outside off, tapped into the off side off the back foot
short ball outside off, backs away and slaps this firmly to sweeper's right. Nicely played
length on middle stump, flicked into the leg side
short of a length on middle stump, short-arm pull to deep square
length on off stump, gets deep in the crease and taps it into the covers
googly at a length just outside off, defended off the back foot
length on middle stump, clipped into the leg side
length on middle stump, blocked on the front foot
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square off the front foot
full on off stump, driven back down the pitch
length on the stumps, defended off the back foot
length on middle stump, blocked on the front foot
length on off, blocked on the front foot
full on off stump, driven to long-off
full on middle stump, gets down the pitch and flicks to long-on
tossed up on off stump, googly, defended solidly on the front foot
length on off stump, tapped down the pitch off the front foot
length on off stump, pushed to extra cover off the front foot
full on off stump, pushed to backward point off the front foot
short of a length on off stump, tapped into the covers off the back foot
length on leg stump, clipped to deep square off the front foot
shot. Nice and late from Mahmudullah. Short and wide outside off and on a slow pitch, you have to wait for it to arrive if you want to cut. He does, and he gets it to point's left
length on off stump, dabbed into the off side with soft hands
full ball on off stump, mistimed drive off the bottom of the bat, into the off side
mix-up avoided with a loud call of no from Mahmudullah. Length ball angled into the pads, nudged to midwicket's left
overpitched on the pads, classy flick to deep square's right
tossed up on off stump, driven to extra cover with the turn
length on off stump, driven on the up to long-off
length outside off, opens the face and runs this to point's left
short of a length on off stump, opens the face and drops it into the point region
short of a length googly outside off, punched to long-on off the back foot
short of a length slider outside off, hurriedly tapped to extra cover's left
length on middle stump, tapped back down the pitch
short on middle stump, dragged out to deep square with the turn
short on leg stump, whipped to deep square off the back foot
floated up at leg stump, flicked to deep square with a big stride
drops it short as he looks to go quicker. Mahmudullah nicely behind it to punch to sweeper's right

gets it wide of deep square and into the boundary. Shenwari tries another front-of-the-hand quicker one and drops this one even shorter at a leg stump line. Mahmudullah makes sure to cash in on this with an aerial pull
another misfield from Nabi. At short fine. Full ball on leg stump, flicked to his right and yet again he runs to his right and is lazy as he gets down to it
length and into the corridor. Defended on the front foot
that's a good-looking shot. This is tossed up wide outside off and he leans into it and drives to sweeper's left. A tumbling save close to the boundary there from Rahmat
short of a length on off stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
short of a length on the pads, deflected to short fine off the thigh guard
length on off stump, poked into the covers off the front foot
length outside off, gets back and punches to sweeper's right
short of a length just outside off, slides in with the angle and he gets the inside half on the back foot punch as a result. Into the covers
length and in at middle stump, clipped to midwicket from the crease
length on off stump, defended into the off side
length on leg stump, tapped to midwicket on the up
yorker on middle stump, jammed down to mid-on
length ball just outside off, backs away and pushes to sweeper cover
looks to bowl the googly and drops it short. Plenty of width too and he cuts it past extra cover. Sweeper cleans up
length ball in at off stump, pushed down the pitch on the rise
full on middle stump, flicked to long-on
length ball down leg side, can't get bat on this flick
full on middle stump, flicked to midwicket's right
another attempted googly, dropped short. This time he waits longer and cuts it behind square on the off side
bouncer dug in outside off, shapes to cut and changes his mind. Leaves alone
length on middle stump, defended off the back foot
length on middle stump, gets deep in the crease and defends

slapped away and that is fifty for the stand. An important one, and a shot with all the sensibility they've shown through the partnership. It's short and wide and he keeps this cut along the floor to beat sweeper to his left
length on off stump, defended from the crease
handsome. Length ball outside off, neat punch on the up to sweeper cover
stays back and taps the googly through midwicket
googly again, outside off and turning away further. He reaches out to slap it, but can't get past point
tossed up, fuller, driven back to the bowler
length ball on the stumps, defended. Rolls off the inside edge to square leg
length ball outside off, steered to point
fuller on off, comes forward to defend to cover
room outside off, he stays back and cuts it away where sweeper cleans up
floated up on the stumps, turned away to square leg
keeps it on the pads, slightly flatter. defended to the legside
goes straighter and Mahmudullah was quick to rock back and punch it past point. Good running gives them two
stays back and punches this through cover
bowled into the pads, he turns it away to midwicket
tossed up on the stumps, driven to long-on
full on off stump, he comes on the front foot to steer it past point
flatter on the stumps, he goes back in his crease and punches it to midwicket
given a bit more air, on the stumps and he defends with the full face of the bat
goes more outside off, allowing Imrul to push it into the covers
flatter, stays back to clip it, but straight to fine leg inside the circle
strays on the pads, allowing him to turn it away comfortably to deep square leg
gave himself room, but the quicker one, and he gets an under-edge trying to cut
clips it to midwicket
tossed up on the stumps, driven back to Nabi
threw his hands at it. full outside off and tried to hit it too hard. No timing, but the ball goes to long-off
flatter on the stumps, but he stepped away considerably to punch it between point and cover
strays on the pads and Mahmudullah wanted to hit over square leg but doesn't connect. The balls rolls away on the onside
good shot. Opens up the offside again, moving away and making room. Driven through cover
turning into the batsman from outside off, he steers it to backward point
length ball on the stumps, stays back to clip it through midwicket
gets some drift and beats his attempted glide to square leg
steps away again. slightly quicker on the stumps but Mahmudullah is equal to it, and punches it past point
slower ball, full and on the stumps, he waits for it and drives to mid-off
slower ball again, on the stumps and full. He opens the face of the bat to drive to cover
back of a length outside off, cut away to the sweeper
keeps it straight and is flicked off the pads to deep square leg
slower ball again, on the stumps, patted back into the offside
goes wider of the crease, and angles it into the batsman, who stays back to flick it to fine leg. Mujeeb misfields, but it doesn't cost Afghanistan extra runs
length ball drifting on the pads but he's unable to flick it away
straighter that time, and he stands in his crease to punch down the ground
angling into the batsman, who flicks it, but straight to mdiwicket
comes into the batsman, but he moves away to make room again and punches it to covr point. They steal two with Nabi misfielding again
well fielded by Ihsanullah at cover. Punched again, but he dives to his left to stop the ball
gives himself room to steer it, but straight to third man inside the circle
full and angled into the batsman, who clips it straight to short midwicket
slower ball outside off but he was on to it in a flash. Too much room and Imrul can free his arms and drive through the covers
made as if to give himself room, but stayed put, driving through cover
back of a length on the stumps, he punches off the back foot to long-on
full on off stump, driven back straight to the bowler
back of a length on off, and cut away to third man
short ball outside off, he shaped to pull, but let it go in the end
slower ball, ends up a full toss outside off. Driven through the covers where sweeper cleans up
clipped to square leg for a fine half-century by Mahmudullah. Came when Bangladesh needed it sorely, and he's scored at a good clip too
short ball angling into him, and pulled away. good timing but there is a man at deep square leg
slower ball on the stumps, flicked to mid-on

gives him the charge, and punches the short ball over the infield. The outfield must be slowing down though, as the ball doesn't quite reach the fence, allowing sweeper to run to his right and collect
full toss dipping on the stumps, and he seemed to lose the length a bit. Stays in his crease and steers it to short third man
length ball on the stumps, he goes back in his crease to jab it to long-on
length ball on the stumps, punched to long-on off the back foot
fuller on the stumps, he comes forward and flicks it to midwicket
shorter one, on the stumps. He stays back and cuts it past point's right
fired into the stumps, but he pushes it into the midwicket area. No fielder so they can steal a second
tossed up on offstump, glides it to short third man
defeats him with the drift and and hits him on the pads. Pitched outside leg though
almost stumped googly, and hits Mahmudullah on the thigh pad when he's come forward. Shahzad collects and breaks the stumps, but he got back
wallopped full ball and in the slot for a slog-sweep, executed perfectly, from down on one knee
stays back to flick through midwicket
turning in from offstump, he plays it away towards midwicket
through him missed the full ball and it went past his bat, but past the stumps too
full toss, flicked away to midwicket
tries to paddle it but doesn't get enough on it. Straight to short fine leg. Kayes wanted the quick single but was sent back. The throw was too wide to have him in trouble
stays back and clips this length ball on the pads through midwicket
floated up full toss outside off, driven through the covers but not timed well
steps away and drives on the up through the covers
misses the reverse sweep tried to smack it, but was hit on the pads. They appeal, but decide against a review
Rashid is under the pump here huge stride out and slog swept him over midwicket once again
strays on the pads, and he misses the flick, but Shahzad misses it too, allowing runs
googly, but he stays back in his crease to punch it to cover
full leg-break, he goes on the front foot to turn to short fine-leg. Quick single taken
googly, he stays back in his crease and turns it to square leg
slower ball, floated outside off and turns into a full toss. square driven past point to raise a good fifty. He needed to guard against a collapse and he's done that.
slower ball again, and full toss dipping outside off. throws his bat at it and gets it away past cover point
yorker, dug out to the offside
attempted slower yorker, he gives himself room and drives it powerfully to long-off
another slower ball that ends up a full toss outside off, and he gets enough bat on it to slash it away to the point boundary
gets the yorker right this time, squeezed out to the bowler
yorker, goes through him. outside off stump and sneaks under the bat, but past the stumps

bad ball gets a wicket too short and too wide outside off. If he had left it alone it would have been a wide probably, but at this stage you back yourself to find the boundary if set and he reached out to carve it. Went straight to Rashid on the point fence though
slower bouncer outside off, he just watched it go. He thought it might be a wide and looks at the umpire, but that was within the white lines
tries for the yorker again, but strays down leg and is whipped away to square leg
yorker on the stumps, tapped to midwicket
great timing stays back and pulls this short of a ball past square leg
googly, he wanted an almighty swipe at it. gets enough bat on it to send it to deep square leg
reverse sweep read that perfectly and timed his reverse sweep superbly to get it past the third man fielder
nudged to fine leg
steps away to thwack it but only gets it to cover

another big heave and he gets an inside edge that rolls past the wicketkeeper. They steal a single and there is a needless shy at the stumps by Mujeeb running in from short fine leg, allowing an overthrow
pulled away powerfully. Short ball that sat up and Mashrafe got hold of it, but the man at deep midwicket stops it
inside edge four He wanted to send that over long-on, but gets an inside edge that races to the fine leg fence
gets the yorker right and he can only dig it back out to the bowler. Aftab has a mock shy at the stumps
full ball on the pads. Mashrafe was moving around in his crease but Aftab bowled it well. Driven to long-on
full on off, he steps away and lofts it over the circle, but there is long-off who collects it one bounce

clever bowling Mashrafe was moving across to paddle it perhaps. Aftab spotted it, and bowled another of his slower ones. The batsman didn't pick it, and the ball kissed his bat to lob up to the keeper for the simplest of catches
comes down the track and swings at it, the thick edge rolls down to third man
picked up the slower ball full toss outside off and swatted it to long-on
moved across his stumps a long way and the bowler followed him, but he was able to pick it up off his feet and hit it to deep square leg
down the track, but he can't get hold of it. Toe ends it to long-on
yorker on off stump and bunted back past the bowler to long-off
spotted him coming down the track and tried to shorten his length and go wide, but went too wide.
back of the hand slower ball, defeats the batsman's attempted paddle and past leg stump, but Shahzad can't collect
nice way to finish, full toss on off stump and driven through the covers and into the gap
loud shout first up but going down leg. Comes back into Shahzad and hits him on the pads
smacked short ball, sat up to be hit and Shahzad was on to it in a flash. Swivelled to pull it to midwicket
walks down the track and adjusts. length ball on the pads and he flicks it off his hips past the short fine leg
strays down legside for a wide. Mortaza under pressure immediately
length ball on the stumps, patted down to mid-on
back of a length on off, defended to point
length ball on the stumps, defended with the full face of the bat
fullish on the pads, he tries to turn it away but doesn't get enough bat on it
given some air, but on the pads again, tuned to short fine-leg
stays round the wicket and angling into the pads
gets some bat on it this time, but again to short fine leg.
goes straight back down the ground and over the bowler for four. He had enough of that on the pads line so stepped out and took matters into his own hands
full ball on the stumps, defended back
length ball, tried to cut it from the stumps. Only goes as far as cover
length outside off, he nudges it to third man. Not much footwork from Shahzad
angles it into the batsman, who tries to tuck it off his hips but can't connect
strays too far down, and pays the penalty. Nicely flicked off his pads and into the fine-leg fence
short of a length outside off, he stands and punches, but straight to cover
back of a length outside off, he tries to drag it over mid-on but only toe-ends it into the legside
comes forward to defend this full ball, it rolls off the inside edge from in front of his pads to short fine leg

dropped Mohammad Mithun shells the chance running back from mid-on. Shahzad came down the track to go over the top, but got only the toe end of the bat. Mithun didn't judge it at all, and the ball ends up hitting his head. Adding injury to insult
defended to cover off the front foot
flatter outside off, tries to chop it away but underedges it
drifts in a bit on leg stump and the batsman tentatively defends
goes back to punch it to mid-on with a horizontal bat. Quicker one
The Fizz strikes first ball angled across the batsman from over the wicket. Full and tempted him into going for the drive, but he couldn't keep it down, ansliced d it went straight to point
back of a length on off, and defended back
full on the stumps and punched to cover. There was a single there, but Shahzad was static and said no.
angling across him, he punches it from outside off to cover
lovely drive, but straight to short cover. Full ball on offstump and he leaned into the drive well, but Mortaza was there to stop it
length ball on off, patted back to mid-off. Wicket maiden
short ball outside off with a lot of room, but he slaps it straight to cover off the back foot
full on middle stump, driven to mid-on
lbw appeal turned down. He's caught on the back foot trying to play the flick, but that's hit him on leg stump and is sliding down
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
boom. Short and wide and this time he doesn't let it go. Absolutely plunders this past cover off the back foot
length ball on off stump, pushed down the pitch off the front foot
short of a length at the hips. Gets on top of the bounce and clips it to square leg
length ball slanted across the corridor. Left alone
length ball just outside off, defended into the covers off the back foot
length outside off, turned into the midwicket region off the toe-end
length ball cutting away from off stump, defended into the covers
short of a length on leg stump, dropped to midwicket's right with soft hands
length ball at off stump, tapped to mid-on with the angle

direct hit at the non-striker's end! Rahmat is diving but it doesn't look good. He's gone! Sensational work from Shakib at point. A dive to his right to stop Shahzad's cut first of all and then, despite not having the ball in his hand, a quick recovery to pick up chuck the stumps down with his throwing arm. There was no run there, more so with Shahzad as his partner. Poor judgement from Rahmat
length on middle stump, blocked off the front foot
short of a length on off stump, sliced to point off the back foot
full on leg stump, clipped through midwicket off the front foot
full on middle stump, driven back to the bowler with the turn
slashed away. Massive disrespect towards the ball. Short and wide and he doesn't even bother moving his feet as he sends it flying to the backward point boundary
short of a length on leg stump, tapped to square leg off the back foot
length on middle stump, defended off the back foot
length on off stump, tapped on the up to mid-off
short of a length outside off, stabs at it and is beaten
length on middle stump, leans in and flicks to midwicket's left
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket with the turn
another lbw appeal turned down. Short ball keeps low as he looks to pull and hits him on the back leg, but the bowler is bowling around the wicket and it has pitched outside leg
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on middle stump, tapped back to the bowler
length on middle, punched to long-on
length on middle stump, tapped back to the bowler on the up
length ball into the corridor, tapped back to the bowler
length on off stump, punched to long-off
length on middle stump, punched to long-on off the front foot
full on middle stump, pushed through flat and he hurriedly drives back to the bowler
full on off stump, driven cleanly to long-off
length ball pushed flat at middle stump, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
short of a length on off stump, backs away and mistimes the cut
length ball on leg stump. Allows it to come on and tickles it fine
short of a length just outside off, chopped straight to point
short outside off, cut to sweeper cover
length on off stump, punched with the turn to long-on
short of a length in the corridor, backs away and is beaten as he looks to cut
length outside off, steps out and stabs it past extra cover with the turn
length on leg stump, pushed to midwicket off the front foot
short of a length on leg stump, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
full on off stump, driven to long-off's right off the outside half of the bat
full on middle stump, steps out and flicks to mid-on
full on middle stump, can't get the on-drive past the bowler
short of a length just outside off, mistimed cut to cover
uppish cut to the backward point boundary. Some extra bounce in the corridor as he backs away, but he manages to get this wide of the fielder
length on off stump, stabbed off the front foot towards the bowler
short of a length just outside off, chopped on the up to point
length on off stump, pushed to mid-off's right with soft hands
length outside off, jabbed to third man's right with an open face
short of a length on middle stump, backs away and punches to long-on
full drifting ball in at middle stump. Leans in and clips it off his toes into the leg side. There's a big appeal from keeper and bowler who think it might be pad first, but the umpire's right
length on off stump, big stride and push to long-off
full on off stump, steps out and drives with the turn to sweeper cover
full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
arm ball at a length outside off. Goes back to that and somehow manages an under-edge on the cut
uff get out of the way. No one's going to even try stopping that, so hard has Shahzad slapped at it. Short and wide ball and he sends it to the point boundary
length on middle stump, defended towards mid-on off the back foot
length on middle stump, blocked off the front foot to mid-on
length on middle stump, jabbed down the pitch off the front foot
length on off stump, punched to extra cover's left
full on middle stump, driven gently past the non-striker with soft hands
length on leg stump, mistimes the sweep and it pings to short fine off his pad
short ball on off stump, cut straight to cover
length outside off, whipped to midwicket off the front foot
arm ball at a length in the corridor, under-edge into the covers as he cuts
another quicker one in the corridor and again, he's caught halfway into the backward movement as he cuts. Straight to point
length on middle stump, can't get his drive towards long-on past the midwicket fielder
length on off stump, defended into the covers
length outside off, chopped to point on the bounce
short ball outside off, can't get the cut past the square. It's off the under-edge
short of a length on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
inside edge past off stump. Can't get the cut away this time. This short of a length ball skids low into the corridor. It flies through to Rahim on the bounce
length on middle stump, nudged to midwicket off the front foot
length ball on off stump, steps out and drives to sweeper cover
length on middle stump, tapped into the leg side off the front foot
short of a length on off stump, on the back foot to punch to long-off
length ball skidding in towards the stumps. Tapped to extra cover's right and they pinch a single
length ball on off stump, drives towards long-off but the bowler dives to his left to stop this
length outside off, sliced to extra cover's left
bang. Mortaza looking to get his overs out of the way while Afghanistan are in a rut. So Shahzad is going to target him. Steps out and slaps a length ball flat over his head
short of a length on off stump, opens the face and drops it into the point region
swatted away. Length ball on off stump, steps out again, half-crouches as he shifts the weight into the leg side and gets this flat-batted between extra cover and mid-off
length outside off, slices straight to point
length on off, drops into the off side with an open face
length on the pads, whipped to deep square leg
full on off stump, can't get his drive past the bowler
full on off stump, turns it into a full toss and slices to sweeper cover
short on middle stump, backs away and cuts past cover point
shot. That's fifty for Shahzad. This is caressed, not crashed. Full on off stump, plays very late and opens the wrists to find the gap in the covers. No one in the deep on the off side
full on leg stump, paddles it but can't beat short fine to his right
length on middle stump, backs away and punches to the bowler
tossed up on leg stumps, and turned away to square leg
gives himself room and cuts this ball from outside off to sweeper
full ball on the stumps, leading edge to cover
spotted him coming down and fired it in wider, but the batsman got back into the crease quickly
tossed up on the stumps, driven back where Shakib goes to his left to field it
tossed up on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
flattish on the stumps, he gives himself some room and glides it to third man
tossed up on the stumps, and driven back to the bowler
fired in a bit that time on the stumps, and he keeps playing it straight back to the bowler
length ball outside off, he cuts it but point fields to his left
tossed up on the stumps again, and he tries to drive it past the bowler, but he goes to his right to dive and collect the ball
comes down the track and tucks it away towards midwicket
flat on the stumps, swatted back to the bowler
goes inside out comes down the track and goes over the infield. the ball races to long-on where the substitute fielder dives and pulls it back in. They check the replay but he's fine
comes down and clips it to mid-on
length ball on off, turning a bit away, Shahzad punches it in the direction of the turn to cover
steps out again but can only clip it to short midwicket
shorter and flatter, hit with horizontal bat to long-on
fired in flat from around the wicket, and it's turned to midwicket. Would have been a two, but it's Shahzad, so they decide it's too risky
gave himself room and went back, the ball was on middle and leg but he cut it from there. Point goes to his left to make a tumbling stop
goes back in his crease again, but can't get this length ball away

he did it with the bat, now with the ball Shahzad had been backing away to give himself room, and Mahmudullah was wise to it. Slightly quicker and the arm ball on leg stump - the batsman misses, the bowler hits
tossed up on the stumps and driven, but wide mid-on moves to his left for a tumbling stop
clipped to short midwicket
fired into the pads and turned away to deep square leg
flat on the stumps, he comes forward to defend solidly
hit straight to cover
flat and angling into him, defends it
fired in again, he takes it from off and turns it to square leg
goes wider of off and he tries to cut but misses
tossed up, full on the stumps, and he's manipulated it into the legside
stays back to punch it through cover
quicker one on the stumps, tucked to midwicket
flatter but fuller, angling in, he whips it away to square leg
length ball on off, he comes forward to punch it back to the bowler
length on the stumps, goes deep in his crease to turn it to midwicket
stays in his crease to try and cut this length ball outside off, but only under-edges it to cover
got the shot right that time, getting on top of the ball to cut it past point
short outside off, and he slaps it through cover
tossed up on leg stump, he gets down to sweep it to fine leg
flatter on the stumps, but short enough to tuck between midwicket and long-on and get two
length ball outside off, he punches it to cover
nearly got through round the wicket and angling into the batsman, that didn't turn but kept coming in. He managed to get bat in down just in time to keep it out
tapped to long-on

quick single and he puts in the dive at the striker's end. No direct hit though, which would have had him struggling. That was flat on the stumps and turned away, but short midwicket was on it in a flash. Shahidi has hurt himself with that dive and is getting some treatment on the field
tossed up and full on the stumps, driven down to long-on
strays down the pads and Asghar has missed out there. Got it fine but straight to short fine leg
tapped to the bowler's right, he puts in the dive but can't stop the ball. There's back up though and the batsmen eventually don't take a single
turning across him from leg stump, and defended back
full outside off and he nudges it fine to third man. The man inside the circle has to sprint to retrieve it
length on the stumps, he goes back and punches it, but straight to the bowler
length on off and he stays back to punch to cover
dropped it short, and he pulls it in front of square but without any timing
back of a length on off, he plays with soft hands towards midwicket and they run two
gives it some air, and the batsman comes down to drive it, but straight to mid-off
flatter outside off, driven to cover
goes straight with the arm, angling into the pads, he still can't go past the in-field
uses his feet again, but can only pat it back to the bowler
angling into his pads and he tries to whip it - but once again to a fielder. This time to square leg
finally finds a gap came down the track again and met the ball on the full outside off, managed to pierce the off-side field and timed it well enough too. Much needed boundary for Afghanistan
goes for it, coming down the track, but luckily for him didn't make such good contact and it didn't carry to long-on
stays back in his crease and pulls it with great force. It wasn't that short, but because he was ready for it, he got it away to the deep midwicket fence
takes a step forward and taps it past the bowler to long-on
comes down the track again, but Shakib slows it down and flights it. He waits and cuts to point
full on off, driven to long-off
tossed up on the pads, worked away to square leg
given some air, full on the stumps and the batsman toe-ends it back to the bowler
some air again, outside off, he pushes it down to long-off
flatter on the stumps, and he turns it straight to short midwicket. Loud call for 'NO' to the single.
tossed up and full, he clips it but again to short midwicket
misses out short and down legside, that was begging to be put away, but he only gets a glove on it past the keeper to fine leg
keeps it full on off this time, and is tapped down to long-on
back of a length on off, tapped into the offside and they go through for a quick single. Asghar ran into the stumps at the non-striker's end
back of a length on the stumps, nudged down to third man
angled into him, and he tucks it off his pads to midwicket
width outside off and slashed fiercely, but point makes a diving stop
strays down the pads, and the batsman was walking down the track a half-step, manages to turn it off his hips to fine leg
length ball on the stumps, he plays it gently towards square leg and they run two because the fielder has to run in from the boundary to collect the ball
length on the stumps, he steps out and pats it to long-on
length outside off, and he tries to cut it but under-edges back to the bowler
straighter and on the pads, worked away to square leg
fired into the stumps, and blocked back to the bowler's left
fired into the stumps from wide of the crease, he punches it down to long-on
short on offstump, and whipped away between deep midwicket and long-on
bouncer headed straight for the helmet. Forces him to duck under it
beaten. Length outside off, looks for the cover drive but he isn't close enough with his forward stride
full outside off, to the pitch this time as he drives to the sweeper to bring up his third consecutive fifty
shot! He's not fazed by the bouncer. Up at his ribs and he slaps it in front of square. There's no one at deep midwicket and it's four
length in the corridor, defended from the crease
short and very wide outside off, makes good connection on the cut but point leaps to the right to save some runs
full ball on off stump, steps out to make it a full toss and drives to long-off's right
length ball outside off, gets back in the crease and punches to long-on
gets it wide of deep square. Arm ball slants into his leg stump and he uses the extra pace on it to swivel and slap it uppishly in front of square
full on off stump, steps out and drives to long-off
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
floated up at a length outside off. Makes him reach for it and he can't flick it past midwicket
full and in at off stump, mistimed straight drive straight back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, punches off the sticker to extra cover's right
low full toss wide outside off, tapped to sweeper's right. Couldn't get his hands through this fast enough
bouncer dug in too short. Climbs over the batsman's head as he ducks underneath
length on off stump, tapped to extra cover on the up
offcutter at a length outside off, chopped to third man
another bouncer dug in too short and Rahim has to leap one-handed to parry this up for himself
offcutter at a length outside off. He can only push this down the pitch. Good bowling from Mustafiz
short of a length on middle stump, punches to long-on off the back foot

mix up but he's safe! The fielder from midwicket can't pick this up cleanly. Shahidi would've been in a lot of trouble. Still is from the effort after jarring his knee in with a dive, but at least he's not out. He hesitated as Afghan dropped the ball into the leg side and was really scrambling at the end
down leg side. Bangladesh a bit sloppy over the last ten minutes. This one is full and down leg side, he can't connect on the sweep
full on middle stump, flicked to long-on
length on middle stump, gets under this and mistimes the sweep. No one at deep midwicket, but he can't get enough pace on this to beat long-on to his right
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
another possible missed opportunity for run-out. Full and fired outside off. He flicks straight to square leg where Mehidy fumbles as Shahidi has another nervous moment
length on middle stump, opens up his stance but has no room. Taps it towards long-on and hobbles the single
length ball in at middle stump, tapped to long-on with the angle
whipped past short fine and he didn't even need to make great connection on this. Poor ball. Length and angled down leg, it's off the inside half and racing away

taken at third man! There it is, the wicket opportunity. Mortaza has his counterpart. Length ball on off, there for the slog, but extra bounce does him. Gets a top edge. Mahmudullah runs back from short third man, sways around and adjusts to take a good catch in the end
gets away with a short ball heading down leg. Shahidi a bit too eager to put this away. Short fine was in but he can't get it past him
short of a length on leg stump, clipped off the hip to deep square
length on off stump, tapped to the bowler off the back foot
length on off, steps out and drives straight to extra cover
length on middle stump, coming in with the natural angle. Taps it down to long-on
and he'll find it! Poor bowling. Short and fast down leg side, he merely has to swivel and get bat to drag this wide of short fine
full on leg stump, driven to long-on
yorker length outside off, jammed into the open midwicket area
length ball on off stump, punched on the up towards mid-off but Mortaza lunges to his left and stops in his follow through
short outside off, keeps low too. Looks to pull and gets it off the inside edge to deep square
length outside off, opens the face and runs it straight to point
short ball outside off, shuffles and whips straight to deep square
overpitched ball down leg side, can't get bat on it
overpitched outside off, looks to drill this through cover but gets it off the toe-end
length outside off, sliced to point's right
full outside off, drives with the angle to long-off
drilled flat and straight! What a shot. Length on middle stump, down the track and a sweet swerving hit brought about by the turn of his hips
straight to extra cover. Pummels another full ball but can't place this one
short of a length outside off, thick edge to short third man's left
tossed up outside leg stump, a laboured reverse-sweep to deep cover
full on leg stump, nudged into the leg side with soft hands
beaten. Slower ball slides low from a length outside off. Looks to slap it on the up but he's done by Mashrafe
length on leg stump, allows it to come on and picks it to deep square

bowled him! Mashrafe delivers again. Another slower ball from around the wicket. Shahidi gets down for the ramp. Through the shot too early. It's the right line and length for the shot, but he doesn't anticipate the change in pace. It deflects off the front pad onto off stump
length at off stump, mistimed tap to extra cover
short ball slanted into the corridor. Looks to play the cut but there isn't room. He's beaten on the under-edge
short of a length outside off, thick inside edge as he lines up the pull. Can't get it past midwicket
good shot, but it's a big ground. Long-off gets across to his left to cut this drive against a full ball

arm ball at a length outside off. He hasn't picked it. Looks to drive through cover but this slides in and goes off the inside edge. To his advantage in the end because no one is in the circle on the leg side

review for an lbw decision that's been given out. Shenwari is caught on the flap trying to play the reverse sweep. There is an angle in on this, but middle and off are visible. There's no bat on it...it's sliding down leg! Wow that looked an unlikley result but Shenwari survives. Won't get the runs though...
length ball pushed through flat and he cops this on the pad as he goes deep to try and tickle this fine
can't get it past midwicket. Shakib pushing it faster and faster. Yorker length and he gets a thick inside edge on the slog
another inside edge as he looks to slog. Full and fast, runs behind square leg
offcutter at a length outside off, shuffles to try and set himself up to go over mid-on. But it skews off the outside part of the bat to point
length ball going across off stump, whips it to deep midwicket off the back foot
chipped towards long-off as he walks down the pitch to try and swipe one over the leg side. Just so difficult to drag this guy into the leg side...
nails this pull but finds deep square on the bounce. That was viciously hit. Short of a length ball on the pads
whack. Starts too wide this time does Mustafiz. Pitches outside off and it's short, so he can open his arms and slash at this. Gets it over point
thick outside edge to third man. Another offcutter, good length outside off. Jabs at it and it goes down there with the angle
short of a length outside off, gets behind the line and swings across the line. Gets an inside edge to short fine

clatters it over long-on! What a shot. This is a slow pitch, remember, so it takes some hitting to swipe from under a length ball and clear the leg side. But Shenwari has done exactly that. A clean hit to a ball with some width outside off
length ball on the pads, looks to flick and gets a leading edge towards long-off
thigh-high full toss at leg stump, expertly pokes this into the midwicket region and that was two right from the time he thought of it
beaten. Oh misses out on a length ball. It's angled across the corridor. Point and third man are in. But he looks to club into the leg side
yorker on leg stump, back in the crease to flick this to deep midwicket
length ball across the corridor, shuffles a long way across and punches to deep midwicket against the angle
clears deep midwicket who is a long way in from the boundary! Nazmul Shanto is forced to jump up one-handed but he won't get it. Full pace bouncer outside off, Shenwari nails the pull

Bangladesh review an lbw. Offcutter at a length on the stumps, Shenwari looks to sweep him. This could be both pitching outside leg and missing off. Apart from a possibility of getting glove on it...which he has.
appeal for lbw as he looks to whip this into the leg side. He's caught on the back foot. That's pitching outside leg...and missing off
steal the second. Length ball across off, he gets behind it and drags it wide of mid-on. Deep midwicket has a long way to go to his left and he won't stop the second

gets it past short fine! The option's been there and they finally take it. Length ball going across off stump, as it has been. Nabi gets inside the line and flicks it fine. Great skill. And now the pressure is on Bangladesh.
length ball into the pads, dropped in front of midwicket with soft hands
sends it a long way! Another glorious straight hit from Nabi against Shakib. Sees the loop, gets down to meet it at the pitch on off stump and goes with the turn

hits a full toss straight to long-off! Oh that's unfortunate for Nabi. Looks like he wanted to hit it wider but it's come off the toe. He made this a full toss and went inside-out. But Shanto covered good ground and was strong as he took this with a lunge to his left
misses out on the short ball. Ooooh big moment. Short and into leg stump. Closes the face too early on the pull and it's a harmless top edge to short fine's right
steps out and is beaten on flight, but adjusts nicely to chop this through point
misses out on the full toss after stepping out and cutting out some room. Another misses opportunity? Lifts it over cover and Shenwari says no to the second run
nicely done. Anticipates the angle across, anticipates the offcutter, stays deep in the crease and slices it wide of extra cover. Sweeper has some running to his right
chipped back to the bowler. This is good bowling. Cramps him with a short ball at waist height. He's looking to pull and is done by the climb and the angle. Mustafiz barely has to move to get this.

is that out at short fine? No says the umpire. Leg byes he says! Short ball on the pads, he's cramped on the pull. It has definitely pinged off the thigh guard but was there glove first? Nope, there wasn't.
beaten! An offcutter in the corridor, swings across the line and this goes through from under his bat
off the thigh as he looks to ramp this. Short of a length outside off, he can only deflect it to short fine

chucks the bat as he looks to bludgeon this into the leg side! He hasn't made connection before that mind you. Afghanistan have heartbreak again. Short and wide ball outside off. Shuffles, goes across the line. That hasn't worked at all against Mustafiz today, and it won't work in the last over.
